name: Girl and her Teddy
description:
In this short horror game where you need to find the BODY, LIMBS and HEAD of your Teddy bear then return to your BED to win the game.

This is my first game jam and first game that is actually playable .. I have never finished a game so I thought of joining a game jam.. and it worked hahah.. 

A - Left

D - Right 

Left Shift - Run

S - Crouch (its there for no reason)

Z - Jump

X - Interact
